title: Boo-loney Bandits
description:
This was my first attempt at online multiplayer. I joined the SCREAM JAM 2024 with a few friends, and we created this Halloween-themed game where you walk around with others and try to collect as much candy as possible. You knock on doors and either get candy or get jumped and drop it. We had to shorten our list of ideas to fit the jam's timeframe—otherwise, there would have been many more features. My main contributions were:

  • Player controls
  • Online multiplayer (Photon Fusion 2)
  • Year: 2024
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
